segments.text: I'm ready to place an order with you , but only one condition that the goods are confined to Australia . Can you do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I haven't made such arrangements with the factory yet . So I'd like to make sure if it is acceptable to the factory before making a commitment to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , but I'm busy . How long will it be before you can finish the talk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won't be too long , I suppose . Just let me ring them , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2
